oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aviation Corporation sales $640 millions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Short clipping from the Vultee Volunteer that states the annual report released by the Aviation Corporation accounts for $640,000,000 worth of war goods produced by Avco and its associated companies, including Vultee. The report also reveals that the companies have "a backlog of orders exceeding $2.5 billion."

Consolidated Vultee was one of several aircraft manufacturing companies owned by the Aviation Corportation during World War II. The Vultee Volunteer was a weekly newsletter published by the Nashville Division Vultee for the employees of the plant.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vultee Aircraft, Inc.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War 1939-1945; World War 1939-1945-- War Work-- Tennessee
Aircraft industry; Defense industry
